question: Tenglamani yeching.  \mathrm{x\cdot}\left(\sqrt{\frac{\mathrm{1}}{\mathrm{x}}\mathrm{-} \frac{\mathrm{1} }{\mathrm{x}^\mathrm{2}}}\right)\mathrm{=}12
output:
Tenglama: 
\[x \cdot \left(\sqrt{\frac{1}{x} - \frac{1}{x^2}}\right) = 12.\]
Tenglama ichidagi ifodani soddalashtiramiz:
\[\sqrt{\frac{1}{x} - \frac{1}{x^2}} = \sqrt{\frac{x - 1}{x^2}}.\]
Shuning uchun, tenglama quyidagiga aylanadi:
\[x \cdot \sqrt{\frac{x - 1}{x^2}} = 12.\]
Ikkala tomoning kvadratini olish:
\[\left(x \cdot \sqrt{\frac{x - 1}{x^2}}\right)^2 = 12^2,\]
\[\frac{x^2 \cdot (x - 1)}{x^2} = 144,\]
\[x - 1 = 144,\]
\[x = 145.\]
Javob: B) 145
system:
Savol: q ning qanday qiymatida   x^2-x-q=0  tenglama ildizlari kublarining yigâ€˜indisi 16 ga teng boâ€˜ladi?
A) 6
B) 5
C) 7
D) 4
Yechim: \( x^2 - x - q = 0 \) tenglamaning ildizlari \( \alpha \) va \(  eta \) boâ€˜lsa, quyidagi xossalar mavjud:
- Ildizlar yigâ€˜indisi: \( \alpha +  eta = 1 \),
- Ildizlar koâ€˜paytmasi: \( \alpha \cdot  eta = -q \).  
Ildizlar kublarining yigâ€˜indisi:
\( \alpha^3 +  eta^3 = (\alpha +  eta)((\alpha +  eta)^2 - 3\alpha eta) \).  
Bu ifodaning oâ€˜rniga \( \alpha +  eta = 1 \) va \( \alpha  eta = -q \) qoâ€˜yib,  
\[\alpha^3 +  eta^3 = 1 + 3q.\]  
Shartni ishlatish:
\[1 + 3q = 16 \implies 3q = 15 \implies q = 5.\]
\( q = 5 \) boâ€˜lsa, ildizlar kublarining yigâ€˜indisi 16 ga teng boâ€˜ladi.  Demak, javob B.Savol: Agar  2^a = 81 ,  3^b = 8  boâ€˜lsa,  a \cdot b  qiymatini toping.
A) 14
B) 12
C) 15
D) 18
Yechim: Birlamchi tenglamalar:
\( 2^a = 81 \), 
\( 3^b = 8 \).
Bu tenglamalarni logarifmlar yordamida yechish mumkin:
\( 2^a = 81 \) tenglamaning logarifmasini olish:
\[a \cdot \log 2 = \log 81.\]
\( \log 81 = \log 3^4 = 4 \cdot \log 3 \), shuning uchun: \[a = \frac{4 \cdot \log 3}{\log 2}.\]
\( 3^b = 8 \) tenglamaning logarifmasini olish:  
\[b \cdot \log 3 = \log 8.\]
\( \log 8 = \log 2^3 = 3 \cdot \log 2 \), shuning uchun: \[b = \frac{3 \cdot \log 2}{\log 3}.\]  a va b ning koâ€˜paytmasini hisoblash:
\[a \cdot b = \left(\frac{4 \cdot \log 3}{\log 2}ight) \cdot \left(\frac{3 \cdot \log 2}{\log 3}ight).\]
Logarifmlar bir-birini yoâ€˜q qiladi: \[a \cdot b = 4 \cdot 3 = 12.\]
Javob: B) \( a \cdot b = 12 \).Savol: Toza qoâ€˜ziqorinning 90% i, quruq qoâ€˜ziqorinning 12% i suvdan iborat boâ€˜lsa, 22 kg toza qoâ€˜ziqorindan necha (kg) quruq qoâ€˜ziqorin olish mumkin?
A) A) 6
B) B) 5
C) C) 4
D) D) 2,5
Yechim: Toza qoâ€˜ziqorinning 90% i suvdan iborat, demak, uning 10% qismi quruq moddadir.
Shunday qilib, 22 kg toza qoâ€˜ziqorinning quruq qismi: 22Ã—0.10=2.2kg. Quruq qoâ€˜ziqorinning 12% i suvdan iborat, demak, uning 88% qismi quruq moddadir.
Shunday qilib, 2.2 kg quruq modda boâ€˜lgan qoâ€˜ziqorindan olish mumkin boâ€˜lgan quruq qoâ€˜ziqorin miqdori: 0.88/2.2â‰ˆ2.5kg. Demak, 22 kg toza qoâ€˜ziqorinidan 2.5 kg quruq qoâ€˜ziqorin olish mumkin
Demak, javob D.Savol: Muayyan masofani bosib oâ€˜tish uchun ketadigan vaqtni $25\%$ ga kamaytirish uchun tezlikni necha foiz orttirish kerak?
A) $25$
B) $20$
C) $33\ rac{1}{3}$
D) $30$
Yechim: Masofani bosib oâ€˜tish uchun vaqtni kamaytirish, tezlikni oshirishga teng. Agar masofa 
ğ‘‘ va boshlangâ€˜ich tezlik ğ‘£ boâ€˜lsa, vaqt ğ‘¡ = ğ‘‘ / ğ‘£  boâ€˜ladi. Agar vaqtni 25% ga kamaytirish kerak boâ€˜lsa, yangi vaqt 
ğ‘¡â€²=ğ‘¡â‹…(1âˆ’0.25)=0.75â‹…t boâ€˜ladi. Yangi tezlik ğ‘£â€²=ğ‘‘ / ğ‘¡â€². Vaqtni 0.75 ga kamaytirganimiz uchun tezlikni ham 1/0.75=4/3 baravar oshirish kerak. Tezlikning yangi qiymati eski qiymatining 4/3
qismini tashkil etadi. Demak, tezlikni (4/3 âˆ’ 1)Ã—100=1/3Ã—100=33.33% ga oshirish kerak. Demak, javob C.Savol: Teng yonli uchburchakning perimetri 10 ga teng,yon tomoni asosidan 12 marta uzun. Uchburchakning asosi qanchaga teng?
A) 0,4
B) 0,8
C) 0,5
D) 0,6
Yechim: Teng yonli uchburchakda ikkita yon tomon bir xil boâ€˜ladi, deb belgilaymiz. Agar asosning uzunligini \( x \) deb belgilasak, yon tomonning uzunligi \( 12x \) boâ€˜ladi.
Perimetr \( P \) uchburchakning uch tomonining yigâ€˜indisi boâ€˜lib, quyidagicha ifodalanadi: \[P = x + 2 \cdot 12x = 10.\]
Bu tenglamani yechamiz: \[x + 24x = 10 \implies 25x = 10 \implies x = \frac{10}{25} = 0.4.\] 
Demak, uchburchakning asosi \(  oxed{0.4} \) metrga teng va javob A.

question: Agar  x + 2y = 7  va  3y âˆ’ z = 5  boâ€˜lsa,  3xy + 6y^{2} âˆ’ xz âˆ’ 2yz = ?
output:
Berilgan tenglamalarni kuzatib koâ€˜ring:
\[x + 2y = 7 \, \text{ va } \, 3y - z = 5.\]
Istalgan ifodani topish uchun:
\[3xy + 6y^2 - xz - 2yz.\]
Birinchi tenglamadan \(x\) ni ajratib:
\[x = 7 - 2y.\]
Ikkinchi tenglamadan \(z\) ni ajratib:
\[z = 3y - 5.\]
Endi, \(x\) va \(z\) ni \(3xy + 6y^2 - xz - 2yz\) ifodasiga almashtiring:
\[3(7 - 2y)y + 6y^2 - (7 - 2y)(3y - 5) - 2y(3y - 5).\]
Har bir qismni kengaytirib:
\[21y - 6y^2 + 6y^2 - 21y + 10y + 14y - 10y - 6y^2 + 10y.\]
Xuddi shu terminlarni birlashtiring:
\[-6y^2 + 6y^2 - 6y^2 + 21y - 21y + 10y + 14y - 10y + 10y.\]
Soddalashtirish:
\[-6y^2 + 14y.\]
Lekin, \(3y - z = 5\) tenglamasidan \(z\) ni topish mumkin:
\[z = 3y - 5.\]
Va, \(x + 2y = 7\) dan \(x\) ni topish mumkin:
\[x = 7 - 2y.\]
Endi, asl ifodaga \(x\) va \(z\) ni qaytaring:
\[3xy + 6y^2 - xz - 2yz = 3(7 - 2y)y + 6y^2 - (7 - 2y)(3y - 5) - 2y(3y - 5).\]
Kengaytirib:
\[= 21y - 6y^2 + 6y^2 - 21y + 10y + 14y - 10y - 6y^2 + 10y.\]
Barcha xuddi shu terminlarni birlashtiring:
\[= 21y - 21y + 10y + 14y - 10y + 10y - 6y^2 + 6y^2.\]
Soddalashtirish:
\[= 14y.\]
\(3y - z = 5\) tenglamasidan \(y\) ni topish uchun \(z\) ni ajratib oling:
\[3y = z + 5,\]
\[y = \frac{z + 5}{3}.\]
Endi, \(x + 2y = 7\) tenglamasidan \(x\) ni topish uchun \(y\) ni almashtiring:
\[x + 2\left(\frac{z + 5}{3}\right) = 7,\]
\[x + \frac{2z + 10}{3} = 7,\]
\[3x + 2z + 10 = 21,\]
\[3x + 2z = 11.\]
\(3y - z = 5\) tenglamasidan \(z\) ni topish uchun \(y\) ni almashtiring:
\[3\left(\frac{z + 5}{3}\right) - z = 5,\]
\[z + 5 - z = 5,\]
\[5 = 5.\]
Bu tenglama \(z\) ning istalgan qiymati uchun toâ€˜gâ€˜ri boâ€˜ladi, lekin \(y\) ning maâ€˜lum qiymatini topish uchun \(z\) ning maâ€˜lum qiymatini topish kerak.
\(x + 2y = 7\) tenglamasidan \(x\) ni topish uchun \(y\) ni almashtiring:
\[x + 2\left(\frac{11}{6}\right) = 7,\]
\[x + \frac{11}{3} = 7,\]
\[3x + 11 = 21,\]
\[3x = 10,\]
\[x = \frac{10}{3}.\]
Endi, \(3xy + 6y^2 - xz - 2yz\) ifodasini hisoblaymiz

Savol: q ning qanday qiymatida   x^2-x-q=0  tenglama ildizlari kublarining yigâ€˜indisi 16 ga teng boâ€˜ladi?
A) 6
B) 5
C) 7
D) 4
Yechim: \( x^2 - x - q = 0 \) tenglamaning ildizlari \( \alpha \) va \(  eta \) boâ€˜lsa, quyidagi xossalar mavjud:
- Ildizlar yigâ€˜indisi: \( \alpha +  eta = 1 \),
- Ildizlar koâ€˜paytmasi: \( \alpha \cdot  eta = -q \).  
Ildizlar kublarining yigâ€˜indisi:
\( \alpha^3 +  eta^3 = (\alpha +  eta)((\alpha +  eta)^2 - 3\alpha eta) \).  
Bu ifodaning oâ€˜rniga \( \alpha +  eta = 1 \) va \( \alpha  eta = -q \) qoâ€˜yib,  
\[\alpha^3 +  eta^3 = 1 + 3q.\]  
Shartni ishlatish:
\[1 + 3q = 16 \implies 3q = 15 \implies q = 5.\]
\( q = 5 \) boâ€˜lsa, ildizlar kublarining yigâ€˜indisi 16 ga teng boâ€˜ladi.  Demak, javob B.Savol: Agar  2^a = 81 ,  3^b = 8  boâ€˜lsa,  a \cdot b  qiymatini toping.
A) 14
B) 12
C) 15
D) 18
Yechim: Birlamchi tenglamalar:
\( 2^a = 81 \), 
\( 3^b = 8 \).
Bu tenglamalarni logarifmlar yordamida yechish mumkin:
\( 2^a = 81 \) tenglamaning logarifmasini olish:
\[a \cdot \log 2 = \log 81.\]
\( \log 81 = \log 3^4 = 4 \cdot \log 3 \), shuning uchun: \[a = \frac{4 \cdot \log 3}{\log 2}.\]
\( 3^b = 8 \) tenglamaning logarifmasini olish:  
\[b \cdot \log 3 = \log 8.\]
\( \log 8 = \log 2^3 = 3 \cdot \log 2 \), shuning uchun: \[b = \frac{3 \cdot \log 2}{\log 3}.\]  a va b ning koâ€˜paytmasini hisoblash:
\[a \cdot b = \left(\frac{4 \cdot \log 3}{\log 2}ight) \cdot \left(\frac{3 \cdot \log 2}{\log 3}ight).\]
Logarifmlar bir-birini yoâ€˜q qiladi: \[a \cdot b = 4 \cdot 3 = 12.\]
Javob: B) \( a \cdot b = 12 \).Savol: Toza qoâ€˜ziqorinning 90% i, quruq qoâ€˜ziqorinning 12% i suvdan iborat boâ€˜lsa, 22 kg toza qoâ€˜ziqorindan necha (kg) quruq qoâ€˜ziqorin olish mumkin?
A) A) 6
B) B) 5
C) C) 4
D) D) 2,5
Yechim: Toza qoâ€˜ziqorinning 90% i suvdan iborat, demak, uning 10% qismi quruq moddadir.
Shunday qilib, 22 kg toza qoâ€˜ziqorinning quruq qismi: 22Ã—0.10=2.2kg. Quruq qoâ€˜ziqorinning 12% i suvdan iborat, demak, uning 88% qismi quruq moddadir.
Shunday qilib, 2.2 kg quruq modda boâ€˜lgan qoâ€˜ziqorindan olish mumkin boâ€˜lgan quruq qoâ€˜ziqorin miqdori: 0.88/2.2â‰ˆ2.5kg. Demak, 22 kg toza qoâ€˜ziqorinidan 2.5 kg quruq qoâ€˜ziqorin olish mumkin
Demak, javob D.Savol: Muayyan masofani bosib oâ€˜tish uchun ketadigan vaqtni $25\%$ ga kamaytirish uchun tezlikni necha foiz orttirish kerak?
A) $25$
B) $20$
C) $33\ rac{1}{3}$
D) $30$
Yechim: Masofani bosib oâ€˜tish uchun vaqtni kamaytirish, tezlikni oshirishga teng. Agar masofa 
ğ‘‘ va boshlangâ€˜ich tezlik ğ‘£ boâ€˜lsa, vaqt ğ‘¡ = ğ‘‘ / ğ‘£  boâ€˜ladi. Agar vaqtni 25% ga kamaytirish kerak boâ€˜lsa, yangi vaqt 
ğ‘¡â€²=ğ‘¡â‹…(1âˆ’0.25)=0.75â‹…t boâ€˜ladi. Yangi tezlik ğ‘£â€²=ğ‘‘ / ğ‘¡â€². Vaqtni 0.75 ga kamaytirganimiz uchun tezlikni ham 1/0.75=4/3 baravar oshirish kerak. Tezlikning yangi qiymati eski qiymatining 4/3
qismini tashkil etadi. Demak, tezlikni (4/3 âˆ’ 1)Ã—100=1/3Ã—100=33.33% ga oshirish kerak. Demak, javob C.Savol: Teng yonli uchburchakning perimetri 10 ga teng,yon tomoni asosidan 12 marta uzun. Uchburchakning asosi qanchaga teng?
A) 0,4
B) 0,8
C) 0,5
D) 0,6
Yechim: Teng yonli uchburchakda ikkita yon tomon bir xil boâ€˜ladi, deb belgilaymiz. Agar asosning uzunligini \( x \) deb belgilasak, yon tomonning uzunligi \( 12x \) boâ€˜ladi.
Perimetr \( P \) uchburchakning uch tomonining yigâ€˜indisi boâ€˜lib, quyidagicha ifodalanadi: \[P = x + 2 \cdot 12x = 10.\]
Bu tenglamani yechamiz: \[x + 24x = 10 \implies 25x = 10 \implies x = \frac{10}{25} = 0.4.\] 
Demak, uchburchakning asosi \(  oxed{0.4} \) metrga teng va javob A.

question: Hisoblang.  \left(\ \frac{2}{3}+\frac{5}{7}+\frac{5}{9} \right)+\left(\ \frac{2}{7}+\frac{4}{9}+\frac{10}{13} \right)+\left(\ \frac{1}{3}+\frac{3}{13} \right)
output:
Har bir qavsdagi kasrni alohida hisoblaymiz:
Birinchi qavs:
\[
\frac{2}{3} + \frac{5}{7} + \frac{5}{9}
\]
Eng katta umumiy boâ€˜luvchi (EKUB) 63:
\[
\frac{2 \cdot 21}{3 \cdot 21} + \frac{5 \cdot 9}{7 \cdot 9} + \frac{5 \cdot 7}{9 \cdot 7} = \frac{42}{63} + \frac{45}{63} + \frac{35}{63} = \frac{122}{63}
\]
Ikkinchi qavs:
\[
\frac{2}{7} + \frac{4}{9} + \frac{10}{13}
\]
EKUB 819:
\[
\frac{2 \cdot 117}{7 \cdot 117} + \frac{4 \cdot 91}{9 \cdot 91} + \frac{10 \cdot 63}{13 \cdot 63} = \frac{234}{819} + \frac{364}{819} + \frac{630}{819} = \frac{1228}{819}
\]
Uchinchi qavs:
\[
\frac{1}{3} + \frac{3}{13}
\]
EKUB 39:
\[
\frac{1 \cdot 13}{3 \cdot 13} + \frac{3 \cdot 3}{13 \cdot 3} = \frac{13}{39} + \frac{9}{39} = \frac{22}{39}
\]
Endi barcha qavslarni qoâ€˜shamiz:
\[
\frac{122}{63} + \frac{1228}{819} + \frac{22}{39}
\]
Umumiy EKUB 819:
\[
\frac{122 \cdot 13}{63 \cdot 13} + \frac{1228}{819} + \frac{22 \cdot 21}{39 \cdot 21} = \frac{1586}{819} + \frac{1228}{819} + \frac{462}{819}
\]
\[
\frac{1586 + 1228 + 462}{819} = \frac{3276}{819}
\]
Natijani soddalashtiramiz:
\[
\frac{3276}{819} \approx 4
\]
Demak, javob D.

question: Agar  \left\{ \begin{array}{l} S_{3}=9 \\ S_{4}=16 \\ S_{n}=100 \end{array} \right.\   boâ€˜lsa, arifmetik progressiya hadlari sonini toping.
output:
Arifmetik progressiyada \( S_n \) - n ta hadning yigâ€˜indisi, \( a_1 \) - birinchi had, \( a_n \) - n-had, \( d \) - umumiy farq. 
Arifmetik progressiyaning n-hadini topish formulasi: 
\[a_n = a_1 + (n - 1)d.\]
Arifmetik progressiyaning birinchi n ta hadlarining yigâ€˜indisi: 
\[S_n = \frac{n}{2}(a_1 + a_n) = \frac{n}{2}[2a_1 + (n - 1)d].\]
Berilgan maâ€˜lumotlardan foydalanib, biz quyidagi tenglamalarni yozishimiz mumkin:
\[S_3 = 9,\]
\[S_4 = 16,\]
\[S_n = 100.\]
\( S_3 \) va \( S_4 \) dan foydalanib, biz \( a_1 \) va \( d \) ni topish uchun tizimni yozishimiz mumkin:
\[S_3 = \frac{3}{2}[2a_1 + (3 - 1)d] = 9,\]
\[S_4 = \frac{4}{2}[2a_1 + (4 - 1)d] = 16.\]
Sodda tenglamalarga oâ€˜tkazish:
\[3a_1 + 3d = 9,\]
\[4a_1 + 6d = 16.\]
Bu tizimni yechish uchun, birinchi tenglamani 4 ga, ikkinchi tenglamani 3 ga koâ€˜paytirib, keyin birinchi tenglamani ikkinchisidan ayirish mumkin:
\[12a_1 + 12d = 36,\]
\[12a_1 + 18d = 48.\]
Ayirish:
\[-6d = -12,\]
\[d = 2.\]
\( d \) topilgach, \( a_1 \) ni topish uchun birinchi tenglama ishlatilishi mumkin:
\[3a_1 + 3 \cdot 2 = 9,\]
\[3a_1 + 6 = 9,\]
\[3a_1 = 3,\]
\[a_1 = 1.\]
Endi \( a_1 = 1 \) va \( d = 2 \) bilan, \( S_n = 100 \) dan foydalanib, \( n \) ni topish mumkin:
\[S_n = \frac{n}{2}[2a_1 + (n - 1)d],\]
\[100 = \frac{n}{2}[2 \cdot 1 + (n - 1) \cdot 2],\]
\[100 = \frac{n}{2}[2 + 2n - 2],\]
\[100 = \frac{n}{2} \cdot 2n,\]
\[100 = n^2.\]
\( n \) uchun yechish:
\[n^2 = 100,\]
\[n = 10.\]
Demak, arifmetik progressiyada 10 ta had bor.
Javob: D) 10

question: Avtomobil haydovchisi birinchi soatda yoâ€˜lning yarmini, ikkinchi soatda qolgan yoâ€˜lning  \frac{1}{3}  qismini, uchinchi soatda qolgan 56 km masofani bosib oâ€˜tdi. Haydivchi uch soatda jami qancha (km) yoâ€˜l bosib oâ€˜tgan?
output:
Birinchi soatda haydovchi yoâ€˜lning yarmini bosib oâ€˜tdi, ikkinchi soatda qolgan yoâ€˜lning \(\frac{1}{3}\) qismini, uchinchi soatda esa qolgan 56 km masofani bosib oâ€˜tdi. 
Haydovchi uch soatda bosib oâ€˜tgan jami yoâ€˜lni topish uchun, biz avvalo, birinchi soatda bosib oâ€˜tgan yoâ€˜lning uzunligini topishimiz kerak. 
Birinchi soatda haydovchi yoâ€˜lning yarmini bosib oâ€˜tgan, deb aytgan edik. Demak, agar butun yoâ€˜lning uzunligi \(x\) km boâ€˜lsa, birinchi soatda haydovchi \(\frac{x}{2}\) km yoâ€˜l bosib oâ€˜tgan. 
Ikkinchi soatda haydovchi qolgan yoâ€˜lning \(\frac{1}{3}\) qismini bosib oâ€˜tgan. Qolgan yoâ€˜l butun yoâ€˜lning yarmini tashkil qiladi, yaâ€˜ni \(\frac{x}{2}\) km. 
Shuning uchun, ikkinchi soatda haydovchi \(\frac{1}{3} \cdot \frac{x}{2} = \frac{x}{6}\) km yoâ€˜l bosib oâ€˜tgan. 
Uchinchi soatda haydovchi qolgan 56 km masofani bosib oâ€˜tgan. 
Butun yoâ€˜lning uzunligi \(x\) km. Birinchi soatda haydovchi \(\frac{x}{2}\) km, ikkinchi soatda \(\frac{x}{6}\) km, uchinchi soatda 56 km masofani bosib oâ€˜tgan. 
Shuning uchun, 
\[x = \frac{x}{2} + \frac{x}{6} + 56.\]
Bu tenglamani \(x\) ga nisbatan yechamiz: 
\[x = \frac{3x}{6} + \frac{x}{6} + 56,\]
\[x = \frac{4x}{6} + 56,\]
\[x - \frac{4x}{6} = 56,\]
\[\frac{6x - 4x}{6} = 56,\]
\[\frac{2x}{6} = 56,\]
\[2x = 56 \cdot 6,\]
\[2x = 336,\]
\[x = \frac{336}{2},\]
\[x = 168.\]
Demak, butun yoâ€˜lning uzunligi 168 km. 
Jami bosib oâ€˜tilgan yoâ€˜l ham 168 km. 
Javob: D) 168 km.

Yechim: Teng yonli uchburchakda ikkita yon tomon bir xil boâ€˜ladi, deb belgilaymiz. Agar asosning uzunligini \( x \) deb belgilasak, yon tomonning uzunligi \( 12x \) boâ€˜ladi.
Perimetr \( P \) uchburchakning uch tomonining yigâ€˜indisi boâ€˜lib, quyidagicha ifodalanadi: \[P = x + 2 \cdot 12x = 10.\]
Bu tenglamani yechamiz: \[x + 24x = 10 \implies 25x = 10 \implies x = \frac{10}{25} = 0.4.\] 
Demak, uchburchakning asosi \(  oxed{0.4} \) metrga teng va javob A.
